caption:
This photograph captures a lively scene of elderly individuals playing lawn bowling on a sunny day. There are six people visible in the image, engaging in the game or watching. The composition shows three men and three women.

On the left, a man in a light-colored jacket, dark pants, and a cap is about to bowl, holding a black ball in his hand. Moving to the right, a woman wears a yellow jacket and skirt with a light hat, standing next to another man who is in partial view, wearing a collared shirt and pullover. Behind them, further back in the scene, another man in a striped sweater and dark pants observes the game.

Center stage and to the right, two women and a man are gathered around a small triangular rack filled with black bowling balls. One woman in a light jacket and skirt is stepping away from the rack, looking downward at the balls, while a man in dark clothing and a white baseball cap stands beside her, also observing the balls. The woman on the far right, wearing a white sweater, red pants, and a white cap, is bending slightly to look closer at the arrangement of the bowling balls.

The scene is set outdoors on a well-maintained, green, artificial turf, edged by a low chain-link fence that separates the playing area from lush green trees and a grassy area in the background. The mood is casual and focused, with participants enjoying the outdoor activity and the companionship.
title: Members of the bowling green bowling club meet for a game in central park.  The New York city department of parks waters the fine turf, and club members, who meet three times a week, tend a flower border themselves
